General.Name: Benguet Corp B
General.Description: Benguet Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the exploration, research and development, and production of gold, nickel, lime, silver, and other metallic and nonmetallic mineral projects in the Philippines. It operates through four segments: Mining, Health Services, Logistics, and Others. The company holds interests in the Ampucao Copper-Gold, Pantingan Copper-Gold, Zamboanga Gold, Surigao Coal, Ilocos Norte, and Apayao FTAA prospects in the Philippines. It also develops and sells real estate properties; trades in construction materials, equipment, and supplies; and sells water. In addition, the company offers healthcare and diagnostic services; management, professional, port and shipping, and trucking services; and logistics services to the supply-chain requirements of various industries. Further, it engages in the research, development, real estate, and water projects. The company was incorporated in 1903 and is headquartered in Makati City, the Philippines.
General.Address: Universal RE Building, Makati City, Philippines, 1226
